From: Ray Ormond [b(6); [b(6)@bop.gov](mailto:b(6)@bop.gov]> Date: 7/23/19 11:46 AM (GMT-05:00) To: Lamine N'Diaye [b(6); [b(6)@bop.gov](mailto:b(6)@bop.gov]> Subject: Re: Epstein >>> "Ray Ormond" 07/23/2019 11:46 >>> Lamine - The memo is very confusing. Please draft an email of his actions and current status. Also include what plans were in motion to move him to a GP unit. It need
---------- Original message ---------
From: Lamine N'Diaye [b(6); [b(6)@bop.gov](mailto:b(6)@bop.gov]>
Date: 7/23/19 11:12 AM (b(6)
>>> "Lamine N'Diaye [b(6); [b(6)@bop.gov]" 07/23/2019 11:12 >>> Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
---------- Original message ---------
From: "Shirley V. Skipper-Scott [b(6); (b)(7)(C) [b(6)@bop.gov](mailto:b(6)@bop.gov)>
Date: 7/23

text_blocks.content: From: Ray Ormond [b(6); [b(6)@bop.gov](mailto:b(6)@bop.gov]> Date: 7/23/19 11:46 AM (GMT-05:00) To: Lamine N'Diaye [b(6); [b(6)@bop.gov](mailto:b(6)@bop.gov]> Subject: Re: Epstein

>>> "Ray Ormond" 07/23/2019 11:46 >>> Lamine - The memo is very confusing. Please draft an email of his actions and current status. Also include what plans were in motion to move him to a GP unit. It need

---------- Original message ---------
From: Lamine N'Diaye [b(6); [b(6)@bop.gov](mailto:b(6)@bop.gov]>
Date: 7/23/19 11:12 AM (b(6)
>>> "Lamine N'Diaye [b(6); [b(6)@bop.gov]" 07/23/2019 11:12 >>> Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone

additional_notes: The document appears to be an email chain discussing Epstein, with redactions in the email addresses and names. The text is mostly printed, with some HTML tags visible. The document is likely a part of a larger collection related to the Epstein case.
